A New Book of Old Hymns

chant
polyphony
rounds
a litany
for all through the year

About the hymnbook

This book came about from having the technical background in TeX and a drive to create a book to bridge the chasm of ignorance for understanding the music being sung in the Latin Mass.

While I'm moving in, this page features stock photos by Gratisography.
